has

list.text:
Executive Summary
 In current market conditions, the only option available to implement effective Test Data Management is to
engage resources with specialized TDM skills, and also to procure tools which are expensive.
 There are several organizations where the application landscape does not mandate the need to have
tools/consultants (or) the available funding does not have any room for tools/consultants
 A Simple to understand and cost-effective method was offered to a leading Major Consumer Goods
customer. The solution is named as "Optimized Phases (OPs) Strategy to implement Test Data Management".
 OPs strategy resulted in
 40% cost savings with TDM implementation
 71% resource reductions within TDM team
 90% reduction with adhoc data requests
 35% effort reduction with data setup (Approx. $110K savings per year)

Case study

3

 There are several organizations where the application $#kem#$landscape$#!kem#$ does not mandate

list.text:
Problem Statement
 Common test data challenges includes:






Test Data Depletion
Overstepping
Redundancy
Ineffective reuse of test data assets
Maintain referential integrity of data

 Despite the available information on challenges, organizations continue to struggle with managing
test data due to the lack of expertise with implementing a test data strategy.
 There are several organizations where the application landscape does not mandate the need to have
tools/consultants (or) the available funding does not have any room for tools/consultants. During these
situations, it is impossible to get back the Return of Investment on Tool costs and TDM Consultant costs .

5

Solution Implemented
Functionality Testing
Subject matter expertise in enterprise domains ,building test libraries from use case generation to script,  test execution along with concurrent and interactive application behavior, and effective failure handling can cover major aspects of mobile application testing
Integrity and Security
Mobile applications need to be tested for all of the same security threats that apply to a desktop or web application Testing for security is cloud-based mobile app is performed at four different levels, covering the device, application, data and network.
Performance and Reliability
Use of in-house and commercial tools and utilities to test application performance and reliability for typical user conditions over extended periods of time to help ensure
performance and reliability of the application.

list.text:
Problem Statement
The ideal solution for `idle time'
In our engagement with a large UK Bank our teams work across an application landscape of 2800 applications spread
across 10+ platforms. An annual change portfolio consists of 40 large projects. When a QA Organization operates at such
a large scale there are operating inefficiencies which creep in.

Scale Inefficiencies
*

There is a separate management layer needed to govern testing activities across all platforms/projects

*

There may be resource idle time due to multiple factors as given below
*

During the requirement phase the project documentation may be delayed, creating idle time

*

During design, lack of SME time in resolving clarifications, reviewing scenarios can lead to idle time

*

During the execution phase, lack of test data or test environment availability can lead to idle time

*

Sometimes Project commencement can also be delayed causing idle time

In addition, a lot of times there is a need to support urgent work and scaling up resources quickly becomes an
issue.
Such problems can be effectively resolved by adopting a Factory Model of Operations.
Crowd Sourcing is effective in resolving constraints around cost, availability of testing expertise at short notice.

Case study

4

list.text:
HIX Testing Solution
Health Insurance Exchange Overview:
As part of Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPAACA), public health insurance exchanges (HIX) will be set up to provide
online marketplaces where individuals and small employers will be able to shop for insurance coverage. Public HIX platforms must
be set up by Jan. 1, 2014. Private health exchanges are also increasingly being set up in USA by private sector companies. Payers
participating on these exchanges will have to align their IT landscape and integrate with HIX platforms

Opportunities:
 Public exchange platform testing - State government department driving HIX initiative
 Private exchange platform testing - Organizations setting up private exchange
 Payer and HIX platform integration testing - Payers integrating with HIX platforms

End to End Test Service Offerings
Test Consulting Services
 Test program management for HIX
platform and payer integration
 Test assessment & readiness
evaluation for platform & payer

Test Execution

execution approaches

scenarios

for
